results.supervisor_explanation: Agent missed evidenced problem: The logs for the `compose-post-service` pod show a continuous stream of "Connection refused" errors when trying to connect to the `text-service`. This is a clear and persistent failure of inter-service communication. Even though the `text-service` pod and service appear to be running correctly, the inability of a dependent service to connect is definitive evidence of a system problem.
